The "Lead Gen" Trap.

You know the drill. You pay $150 for a lead. You call instantly. They don't answer. Or worse—"I already hired someone."

That's because that lead was sold to 4 other guys at the exact same second. It's a race to the bottom.

× Shared Leads Angi/Thumbtack

Sold to 3-5 contractors simultaneously. Price war immediately.

× Delayed Data BuildZoom/Dodge

You get the project info 2 weeks after the permit was pulled. Too late.

✓ The Pulse Method PermitPulse

We detect the permit the hour it goes public. We enrich the data. We call/text immediately. You are the only one on the phone.
